metadata.title: CVE-2024-35840 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mptcp:use OPTION_MPTCP_MPJ_SYNACK in subflow_finish_connect()subflow_finish_connect() uses four fields (backup, join_id, thmac, none)that may contain garbage unless OPTION_MPTCP_MPJ_SYNACK has been set inmptcp_parse_option()

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
